build.beforeDevCommand: powershell -NoProfile -Command $env:PORT=5174; if (Test-Path '..\app\package.json') { npm --prefix ..\app run dev:web } else { npm --prefix app run dev:web }
build.beforeBuildCommand: powershell -NoProfile -Command npm run sync:version; if (Test-Path '..\app\package.json') { npm --prefix ..\app run build } else { npm --prefix app run build }
